item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 10, 2026 Today's Verse 1 John 4:7â€“8 [7] Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God. [8] Anyone who does not love does not know God, because God is love. Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth.
